spatial_accuracy.notes: Major deviations in door and window placement. The central double-door entry in the plan is replaced by a single door and a misplaced window. The left-side terrace/balcony access is incorrectly walled off from the kitchen. Windows are added to internal-facing bedroom walls.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing the bathroom/utility rooms located at the top-left and top-right of the central cluster. Door wings are floating or curved unrealistically. The small balcony at the bottom is disconnected from the interior floor level.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture layout generally follows the plan's zoning but hallucinations occur, such as the L-shaped sofa in the kitchen area which contradicts the plan's island/breakfast bar layout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric rendering with consistent lighting and soft shadows. Geometry is clean despite its architectural inaccuracies.

detected_errors.description: Missing secondary bathrooms and utility closets shown in the top section of the blueprint.
Entrance doors shifted from center-bottom to side; kitchen balcony access replaced with a solid wall.
Arc-shaped door swings are rendered as physical curved panels rather than indicating path of travel.
The kitchen/dining area proportions are stretched compared to the compact layout in the 2D plan.
Hallucinated sofa in the kitchen where an island bench was specified.
